title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
**Experience Ultimate Home Cleaning with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max**

Elevate your cleaning routine to new heights with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs. Engineered for high-performance cleaning, this sleek black 2554A model combines the power of a vacuum and the freshness of mopping, all in one cord-free device.

**Dynamic Duo: Vacuum and Wash**
No longer will you need separate tools to vacuum and mop. The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max does it all at once, saving you time and energy. Its rotating brush system and 10.5-inch-wide cleaning path ensure a thorough clean on every pass.

**Cordless Freedom**
Forget about searching for outlets and tripping over cords. The powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery gives you up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning time. Effortlessly glide from room to room, tackling messes wherever they are.

**Multi-Surface Cleaning**
Whether it's tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, or area rugs, the CrossWave Cordless Max adapts to your needs. It even works on linoleum, rubber floor mats, and pressed wood floors, ensuring a spotless home no matter the surface.

**Smart Technology**
Stay connected with the CrossWave's WiFi capabilities and the BISSELL Connect app. Improved edge cleaning reaches those tricky corners and along baseboards, while the self-cleaning cycle keeps your machine fresh and ready for the next use.

**Two-Tank Technology**
Keep clean and dirty water separate with the dual-tank system; a 28 oz clean water tank and an 18.6 oz dirt tank mean you'll always be using fresh water on your floors.

**Charitable Impact**
Feel good about your purchase knowing that a portion of the proceeds supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping animals in need.

**Accessories Galore**
Your CrossWave Cordless Max comes with a bounty of accessories to enhance your cleaning experience, including 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls.

Don't let cleaning chores hold you back. The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is here to revolutionize the way you maintain your home. Say goodbye to the hassle and hello to pristine floors with the convenience and power of BISSELL. Shop now and transform your cleaning routine today!

**Unleash the Power of Spotless Cleaning with BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max**

Whether it's tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, or area rugs, the CrossWave Cordless Max doesn't discriminate. It's designed to tackle them all with ease, thanks to its innovative multi-surface cleaning technology. No more switching between devices; this powerhouse does it all.

The CrossWave Cordless Max boasts a **two-tank technology** that keeps clean and dirty water separate, ensuring you're always using fresh water on your floors. After you're done, engage the **self-cleaning cycle** to keep your device in pristine condition without the extra work.

**Smart & Charitable**

**Everything You Need in One Package**

- **Improved Edge Cleaning:** Reach those tricky corners and baseboards with the improved edge cleaning feature.
